title: Lucian's culling is overpowered.
body: He can use it twice in a teamfight, and it can kill a champion on its own.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Feathermane,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r4cndVjm,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-17T00:39:57.566+0000)
>
> He can use it twice in a teamfight

WTF are you talking about? The ult buff was NEEDED on lucian, he was week AF and is now good cuz of the ult buff

he cant use it twice in a teamfight.....even with max 40% cdr its still on about a 63 second cooldown. i play him all the time. also his ult is extremely easy to walk away from. sure if he lands the whole duration on someone, it can wreck them, but its also easily avoidable
yeah and talon is over powered too -_-

> [{quoted}](name=Feathermane,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r4cndVjm,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-17T00:39:57.566+0000)
>
> He can use it twice in a teamfight

wut? Are you talking about Blitzcrank or??
